talk_1008:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Hey! What if we went for matching colors?
That could be cute!
talk_5007:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>Can't you see that I'm all dressed up?<sp:0:4:0>I refuse to let this stylish ensemble get
ruined. If you want to talk, let's do it
somewhere with a roof.
talk_4000:
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:QuestionNormal_00>We went to the dye shop, <sp:5:0:0>the pasture,<sp:5:0:0>
and the lab, but...

<sp:3:0:2:0a01>we weren't able to make it to the <clr:0000>cave<clr:ffff>
where <clr:0000>Misko's treasure<clr:ffff> is supposed to be.
talk_5008:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Sorry, but can this wait?<sp:0:4:0>These are my best clothes, so I really
need to get them somewhere dry.
talk_4001:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS>But since we know which roads lead to
the <clr:0000>cave<clr:ffff>, we can go there next time.
talk_4002:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>How sure are we that <clr:0000>Misko's treasure<clr:ffff>
really exists?<sp:0:4:0>The <clr:0000>clothing collection <clr:ffff>that he spent his
whole life amassing, hidden away in dank,
old <clr:0000>caves<clr:ffff>? <sp:5:0:0>Sounds a little far-fetched.
talk_4003:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_01>You say "his whole life," <sp:5:0:0>but we don't
know that Misko was a "he."<sp:0:4:0>Or even if they were real.
talk_2200:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Are you here on a sightseeing tour?<sp:5:0:0>
If so, you should go where we're going—
<clr:0000>Hateno Pasture<clr:ffff>!
They're famous for their fresh cow milk.<sp:5:0:0>
It's bound to be your tastiest stop today!
talk_3100:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Checking out the sights? Same here.<sp:5:0:0>
We came all this way, so we've got to
squeeze in as much fun as we can!
It's been a good day so far. We already
visited the <clr:0000>dye shop <clr:ffff>and the <clr:0000>pasture <clr:ffff>and
went all over.
Last on our list is the <clr:0000>lab<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>I'd better go, or we won't get there
before nightfall!
talk_4004:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Come on! <sp:5:0:0>This is an ADVENTURE!<sp:5:0:0>
You've gotta stop overthinking it and let
your heart get swept up in the romance!
talk_2201:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>If you're looking for sightseeing spots,
you should go where we're going—
<clr:0000>Hateno Pasture<clr:ffff>!
The milk from their cows is famous! <sp:5:0:0>
How could anyone resist a visit to a
stylish place like that?
talk_3101:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>We came all this way, so we've got to
squeeze in as much fun as we can!<sp:0:4:0>It's been a good day so far. We already
visited the <clr:0000>dye shop <clr:ffff>and the <clr:0000>pasture <clr:ffff>and
went all over.<sp:0:4:0>Last on our list is the <clr:0000>lab<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>I'd better go, or we won't get there
before nightfall!
talk_4007:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I was wondering why you wanted to
sightsee at the lab. <sp:0:4:0>Now it makes sense. <sp:5:0:0>You wanted to go
and find <clr:0000>Misko's treasure<clr:ffff>. <sp:5:0:0>That's quite
the capper to our itinerary.
near_1000: Is the dye shop this way?
talk_1300:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Are you headed to the <clr:0000>Kochi Dye Shop<clr:ffff>?<sp:5:0:0>
That's where we're going!<sp:0:4:0>You can get your clothes dyed there.
Maybe you and me and my friends can
all be matching colors!
<sp:3:0:2:0100>...I'm kidding, haha.<sp:5:0:0> I don't even
know you!
talk_4008:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Well, I happened to be talking to a Cece
fan on the <clr:0000>road<clr:ffff>, and I mentioned that we
were going to Hateno Village.<sp:0:4:0>That's when they told me a rumor that
<clr:0000>Misko's treasure <clr:ffff>was resting in a cave
alongside the road to Hateno Beach.
talk_1301:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice>What's up? <sp:5:0:0>Do you not know where to
find the <clr:0000>Kochi Dye Shop<clr:ffff>?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>I'm heading there now, so you can just
follow me.
talk_4009:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Cece fans traveling the roads know a
weird amount about <clr:0000>Misko's treasure<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>If they're all so desperately searching
for it, <sp:5:0:0>maybe <clr:0000>Misko's treasure <clr:ffff>really
does exist.
talk_2100:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Checking out the sights? Same here.<sp:5:0:0>
We came all this way, so we've got to
squeeze in as much fun as we can!
Today we've still got to look around the
pasture and take a tour of the lab.<sp:0:4:0>Lots to see! <sp:5:0:0>I'd better go or we won't get
to everything before nightfall!
talk_3000:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Tired>That's the lab over there... <sp:5:0:0>Which means
this road going south, that's...
talk_2101:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>We came all this way, so we've got to
squeeze in as much fun as we can!<sp:0:4:0>Today we've still got to look around the
pasture and take a tour of the lab.<sp:0:4:0>Lots to see! <sp:5:0:0>I'd better go or we won't get
to everything before nightfall!
talk_3001:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Tired_00>Yeah, if you go that way...<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><snd:Tired_01>That'll lead you to...<sp:5:1:0>the cave where...
<sp:5:1:0>Misko's treasure rests...<sp:5:1:0>
talk_3002:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Tired>Maybe we'd better call it a day... <sp:5:0:0>After we
catch our breath, let's return to the inn...
talk_1200:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Are you here on a sightseeing tour? If so,
you should go where we're going—<sp:5:0:0>the
<clr:0000>Kochi Dye Shop<clr:ffff>!
They'll dye your clothes any color you
like!<sp:5:0:0> It sounds like an unmissable
experience for fashion lovers.
talk_1201:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>If you're looking for sightseeing spots,
you should go where we're going—<sp:5:0:0>the
<clr:0000>Kochi Dye Shop<clr:ffff>!
They'll dye your clothes any color you
like!<sp:5:0:0> It sounds like an unmissable
experience for fashion lovers.
talk_3005:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Tired>That story of <clr:0000>Misko's treasure<clr:ffff> being near
the road to Hateno Beach... <sp:5:1:0>Is it true?
talk_4300:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Are you headed to the <clr:0000>inn<clr:ffff>? <sp:5:0:0>That's where
we're going!<sp:0:4:0>Usually I get so caught up talking to my
friends, morning comes before I know it.
But tonight I'll sleep soundly!
talk_3006:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Tired>Yep. <sp:5:1:0>I asked a Cece fan on the <clr:0000>road <clr:ffff>about
it, so we're good.
talk_4301:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice>What's up? <sp:5:0:0>Do you not know where to
find the <clr:0000>inn<clr:ffff>?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>I'm heading there now, so you can just
follow me.
talk_3007:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Tired>Good... Probably true, then... <sp:5:0:0>Cece fans
know a lot about Misko...<sp:0:4:0>But for now, let's call it a day... Catch our
breath, and head back to the inn...
talk_2000:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Pastures are great, huh? They've got so
many cows!
talk_2001:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Yes, but only in Hateno Village are the
cows as stylish as everyone else!
talk_1100:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Checking out the sights?<sp:5:0:0> Same here.
We came all this way, so we've got to
squeeze in as much fun as we can!
Today we're planning to visit the dye
shop, look around the pasture, and take
a tour of the lab.
Lots to see!<sp:5:0:0> I'd better go, or we won't get
to everything before nightfall!
talk_2004:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS>Well, what do you say we get ourselves
some milk?<sp:0:4:0>Should we ask a farmer, or...
talk_1101:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>We came all this way, so we've got to
squeeze in as much fun as we can.<sp:0:4:0>Today we're planning to visit the dye
shop, look around the pasture, and take
a tour of the lab.<sp:0:4:0>Lots to see!<sp:5:0:0> I'd better go, or we won't get
to everything before nightfall!
talk_4200:
<sp:3:0:2:0400>You're still not done sightseeing yet?<sp:5:0:0>
Wouldn't you rather get cozy at the <clr:0000>inn<clr:ffff>?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>The lady who runs it is a Cece fan too.<sp:5:0:0>
Though perhaps that was obvious from
how stylish it is.
talk_2006: <sp:3:0:2:0c00>Mm, I could go for a hot cup of milk.
talk_4201:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice>Are you sure you don't want to call it a
day on sightseeing? Go back to the <clr:0000>inn<clr:ffff>?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>The inn's owner is a Cece fan, you know.<sp:5:0:0>
Though perhaps that was obvious from
how stylish it is.
near_00: But we came all this way!
talk_2008:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS>So what are we in the mood for? Cheese<sp:5:0:0>
or milk?
talk_2009:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Or I could use some of that nice, fresh
milk to make a mean egg pudding.<sp:0:4:0>They sell bird eggs in the general store...<sp:5:0:0>
But I'd need cane sugar as well, and I
don't have any.
talk_3300:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Are you headed to the <clr:0000>lab<clr:ffff>? That's where
we're going!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01>But I'm not totally sure we'll get there
in time. It's at the top of the hill, so we've
got a real climb ahead of us.
talk_3301:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice>What's up? <sp:5:0:0>Do you not know where to
find the <clr:0000>lab<clr:ffff>?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>I'm heading there now, so you can just
follow me.
talk_1000:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>So this is it! The <clr:0000>Kochi Dye Shop<clr:ffff>!<sp:0:4:0>Just like they say, it's a smartly designed
shop with smartly dressed employees.<sp:0:4:0>Fitting, considering that this is where
Cece got her start!
talk_1001:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_00>I can't quite decide what clothes to have
them dye.<sp:0:4:0>Or what colors I want. I guess I should
figure that out first...
talk_4100:
<sp:3:0:2:0400>Are you going sightseeing now?<sp:5:1:0> Well,
good luck to you.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>We went to the dye shop, the pasture,
AND the lab today, so we're beat.<sp:0:4:0>Nothing for it but to rest at the inn.<sp:5:0:0>
See you around.
talk_1002:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL>Listen to us, hemming and hawing over
every decision! The joys of fashion, huh?
talk_4101:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>We went to the dye shop, the pasture,
AND the lab today, so we're beat.<sp:0:4:0>We're headed back to the inn now,
so excuse us.
talk_5003:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:QuestionNormal_00>Taking their time, aren't they? <sp:5:0:0>But I
suppose I have to wait until they arrive.
talk_2300:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Are you heading to <clr:0000>Hateno Pasture<clr:ffff>?<sp:5:0:0>
That's where we're going!<sp:0:4:0>We've gotta climb up a hill to get there,
but I'm sure that tasty milk will make it
all worthwhile!
talk_3200:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Are you here on a sightseeing tour?
If so, you should go where we're going—<sp:5:0:0>
the <clr:0000>lab<clr:ffff>!<sp:0:4:0>They say a mad scientist works there.
I can't wait to find out what kind of stylish
outfit they're wearing!
talk_5004: <sp:3:0:2:0c00>I might as well wait until we're all present.
talk_2301:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice>What's up? Do you not know where to
find <clr:0000>Hateno Pasture<clr:ffff>?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>I'm heading there now, so you can just
follow me.
talk_3201:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>If you're looking for sightseeing spots,
you should go where we're going—<sp:5:0:0>
the <clr:0000>lab<clr:ffff>!<sp:0:4:0>They say a mad scientist works there.
I can't wait to find out what kind of stylish
outfit they're wearing!
talk_5005:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:QuestionNormal>Huh? Looks like we're not all here yet.
I guess I'll wait a bit longer.
talk_1007:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>We finally made it, and now I can't decide
what I want. Which clothes? What colors?<sp:0:4:0>This is my chance to prove I'm stylish
enough to call myself a Cece fan. I can't
screw it up.
talk_5006:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>I don't have time for chitchat! <sp:5:0:0>My clothes
are getting wet!
